## Available Policies

| Name                                                 | Implementation                           |
|------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|
| [GreedyQPolicy](/policy/greedy-q-policy)             | `hz.ai.policy.GreedyQPolicy`       |
| [EpsilonGreedyPolicy](/policy/epsilon-greedy-policy) | `hz.ai.policy.EpsilonGreedyPolicy` |

## Common API

All policies share a common API. This allows you to easily switch between different policies.
